text: Van Dieren or VanDieren is a Dutch surname referring to people from the town of Dieren. Notable people with this name include: *Bernard van Dieren (1887–1936), Dutch composer and writer on music *Monica VanDieren, American mathematician *René van Dieren (born 1981), Dutch footballer ==See also== *Van Dieren, French publishing house
title: Van Dieren (surname)
